About me.A bit about me: I'm a student at the University of New South Wales, currently undergoing a Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering. I pursue a passion in creating and designing products with captivating UXs and real-world use to help bring creative solutions to modern challenges.
About me.Experience with software: My experience with development ranges from game creation and app development to web design and scripting. I've become familiar with industry-standard tools such as React and Expo, and have utilised both object-oriented and functional programming styles.

Beams.heading: Beams
Beams.body: Beams is a suburb analysis webapp that merges housing market data and suburb information from a variety of sources to create a user friendly and intuitive hub. This can be used to influence decisions on buying properties by finding suburbs which best matches your criteria.

myWAM.heading: myWAM
myWAM.body: myWAM is a simple tool for university students to track their WAM and keep on top of their assessment progress. The WAM Calculator gives insight on your current term WAM as well as your degree WAM with summaries of performance, while a course log also allows you to keep track of you marks throughout your degree.

Devote.heading: Devote
Devote.body: Devote is an all-in-one hub made and refined for high school students to organise your study tasks, track your assessment progress, view your level of productivity and ultimately balance your social and study lifestyle.

GitHub: My portfolio of open source software projects
Play Store: My apps published for Android devices

Contact Form: Have any questions about me or my work? Want to have a chat? Leave a message and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
